# elements

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

elements is a R package containing **e**co**l**ogical nich**e** **m**od**e**ls for the pla**n**t**s** of europe.

## Installation

You can install the development version of elements from [here](https://github.com/NERC-CEH/elements) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("NERC-CEH/elements")
```
